H0.text: Ethology is the science that extends genetics, evolution, anatomy, physiology, and other biological disciplines.

H1.text: Microbiology is an extension of genetics, evolution, anatomy, physiology, and other biological disciplines.

H2.text: Neurobiology is an extension of genetics, evolution, anatomy, physiology, and other biological disciplines.

H3.text: Chronology is the science that extends genetics, evolution, anatomy, physiology, and other biological disciplines.

A5.text: Microbiologists currently rely on molecular biology tools such as DNA sequence-based identification

A6.text: There is considerable overlap between the specific branches of microbiology with each other and with other disciplines
